title: snowflake.snowpark.DataFrameReader.avro | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Specify the path of the AVRO file(s) to load.
path – The stage location of an AVRO file, or a stage location that has AVRO files.

When using DataFrame.select(), quote the column names to select the desired columns.
This is needed because converting from AVRO to class:DataFrame does not capitalize the
column names from the original columns and a DataFrame.select() without quote looks for
capitalized column names.
a DataFrame that is set up to load data from the specified AVRO file(s) in a Snowflake stage.
